<js>
list=java.getElements("@@class.BGsectionThree-content@li").toArray();
intro=java.getElements('#intro').html();
href='';text='';
for(i in list){
href=href+list[i].select('a:eq(1)').attr('href')+'\n';
text=text+'【'+i+'】'+list[i].html()+'\n';
}
java.put('list',href);

</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
jm=java.base64Decode(java.getString('[name="client"]@content'));
if(jm.length()>1){
var conts = [],list=[];
code=result.match(/codeurl="(\d+)";/)[1];
data=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
datas=data.select("p[style*='text-indent']");
jm=String(jm).split(/[A-Z]+%/);
for(i=0;i<jm.length;i++){
	k=Math.ceil((i + 1) % parseInt(code));
	j=Math.ceil(jm[i] - k);
	conts[j]=datas[i];
	}
	for(i in conts){
		c=String(conts[i]).replace(/.*本章尚未读完,请.*一页继续阅读.*/g,'');
		list.push(c);
		list.join("\n");
		}
	}else{java.getString(".novelcontent@html")}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//条件判断，存在不为空和0，且小于长度
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//返回列表
return m
}
//当前url包含json为发现，直接返回结果
m=/json/.test(baseUrl)?result:loading();
//不包含json为搜索，进行搜索加载
m
</js>

 if(page > 1){
 for(i=1;i<page;i++){
 var data = JSON.parse(java.ajax("https://a.heiyan.com/m/ajax/book/"+bookId+"/chapter?volumeIndex="+i));
 data.rf.map(ele=>{
 var isVip = '';
 if(ele.free == false){isVip=1}
 list.push({name:ele.name,url:"https://w2.heiyan.com/book/"+bookId+"/"+ele.id,vip:isVip})})}};
 result = list</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

var pageNum=1;
var mat=src.match(/"total_page":(\d+)/);

pageNum=mat[1];
}
var list = [];
var bid = java.get("bid");
for(var i=2;i<=pageNum;i++){
var body = "bid="+bid+"&page_size=50&page="+i;
var option={"charset": "utf-8","method": "POST","body": String(body)};
var url = "https://book.sina.cn/dpool/newbook/bookv1/ajax/get_catalog.php"+","+JSON.stringify(option);
list.push(url);
}
list
</js>

</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var obj = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var first = obj.select('div[class="bookmore"]').select('a').attr('href')
var last = obj.select('a[class="bookchapter"]').attr('href')
var start = first.match(/.*\/(\d+.*).html/)[1]
var end = last.match(/.*\/(\d+.*).html/)[1]
var lst = []
for (let i=start;i<=end;i++)
{lst.push([i-start+1,baseUrl.replace('story','page')+i+'.html'])}
result = lst
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('#intro').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//条件判断，存在不为空和0，且小于长度
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//返回列表
return m
}
//当前url包含json为发现，直接返回结果
m=/json/.test(baseUrl)?result:loading();
//不包含json为搜索，进行搜索加载
m
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("1701019k").getBytes(),"DES");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AQIDBAUGBwg="));
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
String(decrypt(JSON.parse(result).DATA.CTXT)).replace(/{{title}}/,'')
</js>

<js>
//java.log(result);
var list=[];
var option={
'charset': 'UTF-8',
'headers': {
    'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/48.0.2564.116 Mobile Safari/537.36 T7/10.3 SearchCraft/2.6.2 (baiduboxapp; P1 7.0)'
    }
};

//获取期刊列表
for(i in result){
	var str='http://new-qk.lifves.com/' +String(result[i])+','+JSON.stringify(option);
	list.push(str);
}
java.log(list.length);
var res=[];
var num=4;
var len=list.length;

//分割并获取每一期刊内部刊数列表
for(i=0;i<len;i+=num){
	var ls=list.splice(0,num);
	java.log(list.length+','+ls.length);
	var temp=java.ajaxAll(ls);
	res.push(temp);
}
java.log('请求结束'+res.length);

//将列表整合成json
var json='[';
for(i in res){
	//java.log(i);
	for(j in res[i]){
	 var html=res[i][j].body();
	 var json1=html.match(/JSON.parse\('([^']+)'/)[1];
	 //java.log(json1);
	 json+=json1+',';
	}
}
json=String(json).slice(0,-1)+']';
JSON.parse(json);
</js>

//书名修饰

	var t='《'+result[i].title+'》 - ';
	//java.log(t);
	result[i].span=result[i].span.replace(/^/,t);
}
result
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('#intro').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

<js>
list=JSON.parse(result).sources
Json=[]
for(i in list){
list1=JSON.parse(result).sources[i].details.data;
for(j in list1){
if(list1[j].title.indexOf(java.get('key'))>-1){
Json.push(list1[j])
}
}
}
result=JSON.stringify(Json)
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>let json = java.ajax("https://" + result.match(/q.bimoks.com\/data.*?\.xs/)[0])
        if (json != null) {
            json = eval("(" + json.replace("_txt_call(", "").replace(")", "") + ")")
            for (let key in json.replace) {
                let i = new RegExp(json.replace[key], "ig");
                json.content = json.content.replace(i, key)
            }
            result = json.content
        }</js>

bookSourceComment:
by.关耳
关键词，搜书名；
@关键词，搜作者。
#关键词，搜作者。
小说交流群462030508。
A群637775313不加人。若家炸了查看此群群资料找新家。
✱✱资源取自网络，仅供学习参考，请同学们在24小时内删除✱✱
■优书网部分书评 需账号登录才能浏览。。
API版的书源需要抓包获取token值才能在书源登录，不方便普通用户使用。www版我又不会搞gzip，最后只整出个杂交版本（反正能登录了）。
■【书源登录方法】编辑书源，右上角，弹出菜单，第一项-登录。弹出新页面登录你的账号。（方法2：随意打开一本书籍，在正文页面点登录也行，登录后退回正文，刷新正文即可浏览所有书评）
■只需登录一次，会记录状态。（貌似）
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
❤️❤️优书网书源的2个用法：
1、直接在发现列表查看榜单，查看书籍的书评（看完书评退回书籍简介页面，换源，看书）
2、搜书界面，选择 “▪︎优书 看书评 换源看书” 分组，
直接搜索书名，可搜到该书籍；
@作者名，可搜索出该作者的书籍；
#作者名，可搜索出该作者的书籍。

<js>
key=java.get('key');
page=java.get('page');

//判定json里是否有列表
if(JSON.parse(result).info.Datas){
json=JSON.parse(result).info.Datas;}

//加载单曲搜索页面并转为json
json1=JSON.parse(java.ajax('https://www.missevan.com/sound/getsearch?s='+key+'&type=3&page_size=10&p='+page));

json2=json1.info.Datas
}

//剧集搜索列表与单曲搜索列表拼接
list=json.concat(json2);

result=JSON.stringify(list)
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
   wordCount: o('.blue:eq(1)').replace('字',''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('.bookintro').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("1701019k").getBytes(),"DES");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AQIDBAUGBwg="));
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
String(decrypt(JSON.parse(result).DATA.CTXT)).replace(/{{title}}/,'')
</js>

<js>let json = java.ajax("https://" + result.match(/q.bimoks.com\/data.*?\.xs/)[0])
        if (json != null) {
            json = eval("(" + json.replace("_txt_call(", "").replace(")", "") + ")")
            for (let key in json.replace) {
                let i = new RegExp(json.replace[key], "ig");
                json.content = json.content.replace(i, key)
            }
            result = json.content
        }</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('.bookinfo_intro').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　🔸最近更新：' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|分享书籍.*|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
url:og('novel:read_url').replace('m.','www.'),
};
book;
</js>

<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}

list.push(url);
}
list
</js>

<js>

//第一种方法
url="http:"+result.match(/<script>initTxt\(\"([^\s]+)\",/)[1];
result = java.ajax(url);
con=result.match(/"content":"([\S\s]+)","replace"/)[1];
rep =result.match(/"replace":\{([\S\s]+)\}\}\)/)[1];
con_=String(JSON.stringify(con));
Aaa=rep.replace(/"/g,"");
rep_=String(JSON.stringify(Aaa)).replace(/"/g,"");
BBB=rep_.split(",");

for(let i=0;i<BBB.length;i++)
{
	CCC=BBB[i].split(":");
	java.log(CCC[0]+"----"+CCC[1]);
	while(con_.indexOf(CCC[1])!=-1){
	con_=con_.replace(CCC[1],CCC[0]);
		}
}
result=con_.replace(/\\\\n/g,"\<br\>");


/*	
//第二种方法
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)/)[1];
var json=java.ajax(url);
//java.log(json);
if (json != null) {
            json = eval("(" + String(json).replace("_txt_call(", "").replace(/[;\)]+$/, "") + ")");
            //java.log(JSON.stringify(json));
            for (let key in json.replace) {
                let i = new RegExp(json.replace[key], "ig");
                json.content = json.content.replace(i, key)
            }
            result = json.content;
        }
*/

</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
jms=JSON.parse(result);
jm=String(jms.body.content).split("a2o@");
function formatSeconds(value) { 
var theTime = parseInt(value);// 秒 
var theTime1 = 0;// 分 
var theTime2 = 0;// 小时 
if(theTime > 60) { 
theTime1 = parseInt(theTime/60); 
theTime = parseInt(theTime%60); 
if(theTime1 > 60) { 
theTime2 = parseInt(theTime1/60); 
theTime1 = parseInt(theTime1%60); } } 
var result = ""+parseInt(theTime)+"秒"; 
if(theTime1 > 0) { 
result = ""+parseInt(theTime1)+"分"+result; } 
if(theTime2 > 0) { 
result = ""+parseInt(theTime2)+"小时"+result; } 
return result; } 
if(jm.length>1){
key="S3VqaWFuZ0FwcDc0NzYwNQ==";
iv=jm[0];
data=jm[1];
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.java.io,
    Packages.java.util,
    Packages.java.util.zip
);
with(javaImport) {
    function decode(content) {
        decode = Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(content));
             byteArrayOutputStream = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
             byteArrayInputStream = new ByteArrayInputStream(decode);
            gZIPInputStream = new GZIPInputStream(byteArrayInputStream);
            bArr = String(" ").getBytes(); 
            while (true) {
                read = gZIPInputStream.read(bArr);
                if (read > 0) {
                    byteArrayOutputStream.write(bArr, 0, read);
                } else {
                    gZIPInputStream.close();
                    byteArrayInputStream.close();
                    byteArrayOutputStream.close();
                    return byteArrayOutputStream.toString();
                }
          }
    }
}

decode(java.aesBase64DecodeToString(data,java.base64Decode(key),"AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding",java.base64Decode(iv)))}
else{"新章节需要解封\n"+"解锁时间还需："+formatSeconds(String(jms.body.left_seconds))}
</js>
